name: unifiedcron
description: A developer tool that centralizes cron jobs from many platforms into one dashboard

scripts.build: pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter api build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter web test && pnpm --filter api test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter web lint && pnpm --filter api lint
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter web type-check && pnpm --filter api type-check
